item.description:
This is the last and final money bomb of 4th quarter fundraising. This last money bomb is to propel Ron Paul to the number one spot in fundraising for the quarter.

Guiliani led with only $10.2 million in the third quarter. Mitt Romney has recently loaned his campaign another $13 million. It is conceivable that if Ron Paul has $25 million at the end of the quarter he can hold the number one position, whether or not a candidate has taken loans. Even Hillary Clinton raised only $21 million last quarter.

The goal again, like before, is to get as many persons donating $100 on this day.

If you cannot donate this amount, please give what you can in this last and final event of the quarter.

http://www.donate2008... for more information.
item.name: Q4 Money bomb
